unknown_error: An unknown error has occurred. Please retry later.

error_404: The resource you are looking for is not found.
error_400: An error occurred during the execution of your request.

exception_user_not_found: Invalid credentials. Login or password is incorrect.

exception_installation_invalid: Session not recognized. Please reload the page. If the problem persists, please contact the administrator.
